full_summary:
[ Request for Proposal: W6854-240303B - Self-Propelled Electric Scissor Lift ]
==========================================================

**Tender Information:**

* Reference Number: WS4066878823-Doc4339637909
* Solicitation Number: WS4066878823
* Amendment Number: 3
* Tender Number: W6854-240303B
* Publication Date: 2023-12-06
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-22T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites electric scissor lift suppliers to submit a bid under the Request for Proposal (RFP) titled W6854-240303B. This RFP seeks to procure a self-propelled electric scissor lift.

**Details:**

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Bidder Requirements:**

* Interested suppliers must submit their bid electronically through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS)
* Bidders must provide all required supporting documentation with their bid
* Bids must be submitted by December 22, 2023 at 14:00 EST. Late bids will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Authority: Chui, Stanley (PSPC)
* Contact Information: stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Attachment:**

No attachments are required to be submitted with this tender.

**Note:**

The Government of Canada reserves the right to accept or reject any bid, and to award a contract to the bidder that submits the best value to the Government of Canada.
